name: Empty Soul - S&S Edition
description: EMPTY SOUL takes you into the story of Solan Walls, a young scientist girl who suffered a terrible accident. Now she must escape from horrible nightmares. Face the fear in this horror indie game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista (Service Pack 2) or Windows® 7 or Windows® 8. Processor: Dual-core CPU or Better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible Card or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible sound card or better
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista (Service Pack 2) or Windows® 7 or Windows® 8. Processor: Dual-core CPU or Better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible Card or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible sound card or better
